resources.string: Already have an account? Log in!

string-array.name: option_description
string-array.item:
"To enter the Navigation Drawer use the menu icon in the top left corner of the app.

From here you can switch to any of the various pages of the app simply by selecting them.

To leave the Navigation Drawer use the menu exit icon in the top left corner of the app, or by selecting one of the menu items to go to that page.

Logout can be found in the navigation drawer near the bottom."

"When viewing a recipe's details, there will be a star icon next it's name.

If the star is empty, the recipe you are viewing is not "favorited".
If it is filled, then it is "favorited".

To favorite or unfavorite a recipe simply press the star icon.

Favorited recipes can be found in the "Favorite Recipes" page."

"To select an ingredient press the ingredient you want in the "All Ingredients" page.

Selected ingredients can be found in the "Selected Ingredients" page.

To unselect an ingredient press the ingredient you don't want in the "Selected Ingredients" page."

"Recipe of the Day:
Displays a new recipe each day. At the start of the app this is shown.

All Recipes:
Displays all of the recipes in our database.

All Ingredients:
Displays all of the ingredients in our database.

Selected Ingredients:
Displays all of the ingredients that you have selected.
These ingredients are saved to your account so they are not lost when you logout.

Available Recipes:
Displays all of the recipes that you can create with the ingredients that you have selected.

Favorite Recipes:
Displays all of the recipes that you have favorited.
These recipes are saved to your account so they are not lost when you logout."
